top_comments.comment: "Discarded maps" lol Discarded is the *name* of the map... next time pick a better organized title lol.
I'll buy it when it's heavily discounted on steam. Just like how I bought BFV.
Different biomes, but same-y maps. Weird.
Woah can't wait to NOT BE ABLE to do all of these and just running around the map getting headshoted from every player out there!......
This is going to be satisfying to play 😍

comments_since_last_sample.body: This game looks the same as visual near future asthetic as Black ops 4, that doesn't confort me. Ain't gonna buy it till these specialists are gone

This game had a such great marking till portal, after they went quiet and the beta came it was just a mess of dissapointing things. Specialist feels like they don't belong to this game, I would buy this game when it gets cheaper, I'm not gonna buy this game only for portal so that says something.

No single player no full price tag.
Try harder EA☝🏻
can i have a free PS5 ??
